{{orphan|date=December 2009}} {{Notability|Companies|date=November 2011}} {{Infobox company |company_name = Quadwave Consulting Pvt. Ltd. |logo = [[Image:Quadwave Logo.gif]] |company_type = [[Privately held company|Private]] |foundation = 1 July 2007 |location = [[Bangalore, India]] |industry = [[Computer services]] |services = [[Information technology]] |num_employees = 110+ (As on Dec 2010) |homepage = [http://www.quadwave.com/ www.quadwave.com] }}
'''Quadwave Consulting Pvt. Ltd.''' is a consulting and [[information technology]] software services company located in [[Bangalore]], [[India]]. The company develops content transformation and presentation software solutions for enterprises, online businesses, and independent software vendors (ISVs). Quadwave is a [[Microsoft]] <ref>[https://solutionfinder.microsoft.com/Partners/PartnerDetailsView.aspx?partnerid=bd9c6cbe79d74000ab6542829cd1292c], Microsoft Solution Finder - Quadwave Registered Partner Web page.</ref> and [[Sun Microsystems]] certified solutions partner.
==Software solutions==
* BPM and Workflow Management solutions * Enterprise portals * Enterprise application development * Compliance frameworks * Web 2.0 solutions for communities and communication platforms * Mobile application development * Open source solutions for enterprises and online businesses * Rich Internet application development * Product engineering and product management for ISVs
==Open source initiatives== [[Image:quadwave office workstations workplace.jpg|thumb|Quadwave Office in Bangalore, India.]]
The Open Source Solutions Lab at Quadwave evaluates, strategizes, develops, integrates, deploys, and supports software solutions for enterprises and online businesses.
Quadwave provides the following Open Source software solutions:
* [[JBoss]] [[jBPM]] based [[workflow]] and [[business process management]] [[solutions]] * [[SugarCRM]] implementation and customization * [[Openbravo]] web-based ERP implementation for small and medium businesses * [[Liferay]] enterprise portal solution * [[Alfresco (software)|Alfresco]]-based [[Intranet]], document, and content management solutions * [[Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol|XMPP]]-based integrated communication solutions * [[Enterprise search]] solutions using [[Nutch]] and [[Lucene]] * Enterprise [[business intelligence]] solutions with [[Pentaho]] BI project
